name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Backend Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in designing and developing distributed systems using **Go**, **SQL Databases**, including **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. My expertise also includes extensive work with caching systems like **Redis**, and messaging systems such as **NSQ**, **NATS**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**. With a solid understanding of **Kubernetes** for orchestration and **AWS** for cloud solutions, I am adept at building scalable and reliable backend applications.

My experience encompasses developing event-driven architectures and implementing **gRPC** for efficient communication between microservices. I am focused on ensuring observability in my solutions, helping teams to monitor system performance effectively. Additionally, I have a strong foundation in building high-performance solutions for healthcare and financial sectors leveraging modern technologies like **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. I've successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities using various frameworks and have led the deployment of enterprise-grade platforms aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
